fullName: Registration Page: Verify that user receives error message for invalid username field during registration

name: Verify that user receives error message for invalid username field during registration

steps.name: Given  The user is on the new user registration page
When  The user clicks Register button after entering a username with spacebar characters other than digits and symbols from sheetname "Register" and row 3
Then  The user should be able to see error msg after entering invalid data
